snippet.title: HYPERVIOLENT - Realms Deep 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
HYPERVIOLENT is a brutal, fast-paced old-school FPS in the style of classic sprite-based 3D games from the 1990s. Coming 2022.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1409200/HYPERVIOLENT/

An anomalous infection spreads through the mines of Commodus Asteroid 27-C. Brutally fight your way through hordes of monstrous foes as you attempt to contain the infection and uncover its dark origins in this gloriously violent, fast-paced retro shooter.

Music by: Our Star Is Dying

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#Retro #FPS
